sentences.en: A comparative analysis of neotradtional developments with a turn - of - the - century streetcar suburb.
sentences.cn: 新传统社区发展与改变时代的电车郊区之比较分析.

sentences.en: Am I on the right streetcar to Seventh Avenue?
sentences.cn: 这电车经过第七街的 吗 ?
公共汽车已经取代了电车.

sentences.en: Example : This isa horse - drawn streetcar popular in that park.
sentences.cn: 这是那个公园流行的马拉的车.

sentences.en: He caught the streetcar to his home in Bronx.
sentences.cn: 他搭上了去布郎克斯他家的有轨电车.

sentences.en: He caught the streetcar to his home.
sentences.cn: 他搭上了去他家的有轨电车.

sentences.en: I like her best in A Streetcar Named Desire.
sentences.cn: 我最爱《欲望街车》中的她.

sentences.en: I met him on the streetcar.
sentences.cn: 我在市内有轨电车上碰见了他.

sentences.en: I took the streetcar and transferred to the bus.
sentences.cn: 我搭乘电车再改乘公共汽车.

sentences.en: It is illegal to shoot jackrabbits from the back of a streetcar.
sentences.cn: 从市内有轨电车的后部射击长耳大野兔是违法的.

sentences.en: Life in those areas, roughly paralleling the historic St. Charles Avenue streetcar line, has bounced back to normal.
sentences.cn: 大体上，在靠近闻名遐迩的圣查尔斯大街有轨电车线附近的那些地区，生活已恢复到了正常水平。

sentences.en: She was scrupulously clean, she showered every morning, and I liked the smell of perfume, fresh perspiration, and streetcar that she brought with her from work.
sentences.cn: 她有洁癖，每天早晨都洗澡，我喜欢香水味道，还有她从有轨电车带回来的清爽的汗水味道。

sentences.en: She was wearing a uniform jacket and skirt, and I realized that she was streetcar conductor.
sentences.cn: 她穿着制服上衣和裙子，我明白她原来是有轨电车检票员。

sentences.en: The cheapest way of doing a tour of the city is to take a streetcar.
sentences.cn: 在城市里观光最经济的方法是乘有轨电车.

sentences.en: The city has taken the old streetcar tracks up.
sentences.cn: 这座城市已经把旧的电车轨道拆除了.

sentences.en: To clear ground , the Nuremberg streetcar depot had to be removed.
sentences.cn: 要想廓清场地, 纽伦堡电车总站必须迁移.

trans.tran_en: a type of bus that runs on electricity along metal tracks in the road
